searchTopics.bodySearchText: Getting Started Topics Create BUILD User The first time you access need to sign up It s free and easy do is determined by your administrator You may have limited some features until admin sets permissions for Admin Console console allows the Administrator manage users domains view audit logs View Audit Log Admins can use download user log files Manage Users Administrators delete assign roles Set Domain Access add each domain from these then be assigned Project Projects Research Studies research module lets quickly create share studies gather detailed feedback colleagues or end about images project pages interactive HTML prototype applications Prototyping Interface Editor includes UI which enables easily prototypes wireframes select through mockups application Smart Template Pages provides smart templates that help design screens Data Models In modify data models organize elements in projects

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You made a smart choice to use BUILD as your prototyping tool
searchTopics.bodySearchText: There are a few tasks you need to complete before can get up and running using BUILD I bet t wait You just create user for yourself maybe add profile picture of your pup administrator will take care permissions as needed

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: BUILD is a collaborative design tool that enables non technical users to create interactive prototypes with realistic sample data making it easier capture more accurate user feedback and jump start development all while incorporating Drive SAP capabilities for research directly in
searchTopics.bodySearchText: BUILD consolidates design tools and best practices from the perspective of both development It enables non technical users such as UX designers business analysts product owners to create application prototypes using intuitive drag drop UI composition addresses key front end pain points by reducing process resource requirements limiting high cost dramatically improving collaboration between at all stages implementation are rich HTML5 applications that run responsively on any device can optionally be equipped with various enterprise services The ability plug in user interface libraries generation different frameworks Angular OpenUI5 features include Editor generate creating interfaces reusable components interactions rules without writing a single line code User research collect feedback colleagues ensure they build want Analytics analytic capture quantitative data provide stakeholders continuous detailed understanding behavior preferences Data modeling facilitates binding used practice traditional bottom up where use new or existing model generates based In addition supports pre defined templates SAP Collaboration for share information ideas quickly efficiently each other context task hand Project management project set manage teams projects shared assets level Technology independence plugging control Widgets custom HTML controls so Jumpstart import prototype Web IDE productize it After is complete reviewed specification Administration Administrators customize platform example specifying supported connecting backend systems All help videos located Help Page accessible menu Check out YouTube Channel tutorials

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The first time you access BUILD need to sign up It s free and easy do User is determined by your administrator You may have limited some features until admin sets permissions for
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Select Join on the BUILD Sign In page Enter a name that you want your team members to see This is screen valid email address needs verify password access You can change later Your must be 6 40 characters long and include any combination of 3 following Uppercase letters Lowercase Numbers sign in start using Check for Welcome message If do not receive one check spam folder an from reply sap com still don t under Contact Info Profile after select Resend verification Open link account now activated The Getting Started displays when first includes videos get quickly started this displayed next time Don show again box at bottom help button

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You can add contact information your photo and change password on the Profile page also resend verification email if you did not receive it
searchTopics.bodySearchText: When you first sign up to BUILD your initials appear in a circle on the top right To change profile Select then select Profile from menu Your user name and email already Contact Info Change or if needed opt out of emails Opt check box add photo Upload Photo upload one computer Drag magnification bar zoom reposition are finished be sure Crop use The is updated page password Password make appropriate changes with Save should now display

You can create multiple projects in BUILD In each project you a unique HTML prototype application invite other colleagues to become contributing team members and user research studies specific the Currently supports only Google Chrome on Windows Mac OS

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: When you use BUILD are always working on a project You can create multiple projects in In each unique HTML prototype application invite other colleagues to become contributing team members and user research studies specific the
searchTopics.bodySearchText: You must have created a BUILD account and logged on to before you can create project Select the new link or New Project Home page A tile is displayed your The not available if previously become team member of another Enter name for press keyboard in section Crown icon indicates that are owner this display opened automatically user Team On research studies invite collegaues join In addition navigate through application by Selecting button return home Research view Files upload files Settings change s settings

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The project owner you can display a picture on the tile Adding unique to each of your tiles makes it easier identify at glance
searchTopics.bodySearchText: You select the project picture from images you have uploaded to can upload on UI Composer Research page and Files Select tile Home open Settings Project Picture SELECT IMAGE image want as a The is displayed All invited members also see

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The owner of a project can archive and unarchive on the Settings page It is not possible to modify archived projects
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Only the project owner can archive a Projects cannot be archived by members To you select tile and do following On Project page Settings Under I want to checkbox then Archive unarchive on Unarchive

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You can create a team for your project by inviting colleagues to collaborate as members The member of are displayed in the Project Team section page projects s owner is identified crown icon also be invited become other BUILD users
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Team members invited to a project can do everything in that the BUILD user who created except delete or archive If you are following Modify prototype application Create research studies and view responses all View add files from Files folder Invite additional colleagues become team of

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You can invite your colleagues to join a project you created or projects are team member of
searchTopics.bodySearchText: On the Home page select tile for project The Project is displayed Under Team Add People button ADD PEOPLE dialog Enter email address of a colleague and added to LIST OF INVITEES section You can invite more colleagues by entering an selecting each Select Send Invite Colleagues you join are sent inviting them For information on accepting invitations see Accept Invitation If invited BUILD link invitation your

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You are invited to join BUILD projects via email or a link on your home page do not have prevsiouly had account because you can create one The project is automatically displayed Home In addition an avatar with name in the Project Team section which all team members see
searchTopics.bodySearchText: If you are invited to join a BUILD project link the invitation is displayed on your Home page In addition receive an email with if have not opted out from receiving notifications Select in or of select Accept account that uses address were using automatically do Sign Up displays Enter details and when log tile dispalyed

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: If you are invited to join a BUILD project link the invitation is displayed on your Home page
searchTopics.bodySearchText: They must have a BUILD account to become member The email they are sent contains link the project or if do not displays Sign Up page Notification of invitation join is displayed on Home You select Show view Accept you team As same rights as owner except cannot archive automatically your In addition an avatar with name in Project Team secton which all members can see

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The current owner of a project can make any member an Only owners archive projects
searchTopics.bodySearchText: On the Home page select project tile of you want to change ownership The Project is displayed An avatar for each team member with their name below in Team section Notice crown icon on your In drag and drop from avartar onto another s make them owner

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You can upload image document and media files Brian I changed to Files since that is what the UI says now Should we include HTML prototype here too Does it need a separate topic m referencing your instructions from composer you require for project folder In addition documents user research studies are automatically added
searchTopics.bodySearchText: You can view project files in the following tabs on Files page by selecting button navigation bar your Everything displays image document and media uploaded to Images or a user research study created use images with JPG JPEG PNG BMP converted GIF PICT PCT PIC file extensions Documents documents for example PPT PPTX PDF XL HTML Media Archives prototypes ZIP

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: Files are added to the project folder if you upload them directly from page or add prototype application user research studies
searchTopics.bodySearchText: One the Home page select project tile of you want to upload files The Project is displayed Select Files button navigation bar Upload Browse and Open You can alternatively drag drop onto them uploaded are on All documents in folder if Everything tab selected filter by selecting Images or Documents Media tabs

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: Create realistic and interactive protoype pages with the BUILD Then you can add UI controls to make your prototypes
searchTopics.bodySearchText: This section gives an overview of the User Interface Editor UI Controls Adding pages and using Web IDE

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: BUILD includes the User Interface UI Editor which enables you to easily and quickly create interactive prototypes wireframes select through mockups for your application
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Create prototypes using images or HTML you can upload to BUILD Prototypes include interactive functions and actions be linked a data model are easily shared for feedback collaboration user research

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The User Interface Editor includes various tools to enable you create realistic and interactive prototypes for your app
searchTopics.bodySearchText: The following image shows the UI Editor tools with descriptions in table below Tool Description Navigation Sidebar leftmost navigation toolbar that includes icons to navigate Home Project Research Files and Settings Page Elements Displays pages elements a page such as images buttons links New button Select each expand its contents Here you can view rename add delete You also Assets Includes files assets uploaded from Drag drop these your canvas create prototype Data Access data editor models manually by importing Excel or searching Business Catalog for model Controls left map controls Open UI5 use when creating prototypes include list calendar more select library search specific documents upload BUILD modeling work bind load sample Toolbar main appears across top of Use it change on zoom fit device type share user study Preview see interactive Then go back Canvas center area where design own import customize Help Icon assistance icon access step instructions videos content help learn Control Properties Customize look feel Actions interactions

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: BUILD includes the Open UI5 UI library controls in Editor Drag and drop to canvas apply properties actions customize their function
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Check out the Open UI5 Developer Guide and Controls Reference for more information

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: View the Page Map from UI Editor or Project page The displays a map view for your project thumbnails and navigation are also represented in
searchTopics.bodySearchText: To view the Page Map Select one of these methods icon from UI Editor toolbar on Project In View Home page indicated by thumbnails all pages in your project navigation green and gray arrows that are defined control properties Add New delete Delete key Prototype Pages a thumbnail to open it

You can create several types of prototype pages Add Blank Pages in the UI Editor to start creating your application add responsive for various platforms blank freestyle or pre defined template indicates an open canvas where you whatever like on Responsive build cross platform apps a page layout use formats phone table and desktop automatically place controls according format tablet Create Smart Template Now that are familiar with interface ready BUILD Templates list report object

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: Add pages in the UI Editor to start creating your application You can add responsive for various platforms blank freestyle or pre defined template prototype create Blank indicates an open canvas where you whatever like on Shared content with Do conditional text and fix this later
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Before you can start creating pages must first a new project for your application See Create Projects When use BUILD are always working on You create multiple projects in In each unique HTML prototype invite other colleagues to become contributing team members and user research studies specific the upload images or simply drag drop from computer If another member is editing page displays as Locked Editing finishes edit To add Open Page Map select Add Blank box then open For details UI Editor tools see User Interface Overview The includes various enable realistic interactive prototypes app also one of these Responsive Build cross platform apps responsive layout platforms phone table desktop mix blank with Pages build formats automatically place controls according format tablet more information List Report Template Use smart templates quickly pre defined template used filter few dedicated objects large set contains bar above using map view at top left rename delete Rename name example 1 enter Delete device All content that deleted undo button toolbar Select New either magnification icon resize canvas Adjust thesize by selecting Zoom Size Fit Width an image Drag uploaded Assets tab Upload Files navigation added folder if them directly it Scaling properties right panel Preview preview Now begin adding Controls make library apply actions customize their function instructions

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: Add pages in the UI Editor to start creating your application responsive build cross platform apps a page layout for use on various formats phone table and desktop Responsive automatically place controls according format tablet
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Before you can start creating pages must first a new project for your application See Create Projects When use BUILD are always working on You create multiple projects in In each unique HTML prototype invite other colleagues to become contributing team members and user research studies specific the upload images or simply drag drop from computer If another member is editing page displays as Locked Editing finishes edit To add responsive Open Page Map select Add Responsive box then open For details UI Editor tools see User Interface Overview The includes various enable realistic interactive prototypes app also one of these Blank Starting with blank ideal freestyle prototyping mix Pages platforms pre defined template indicates an canvas where whatever like more information List Report Template Use smart templates quickly used filter few dedicated objects large set contains bar above table map view at top left rename delete Rename name example 1 enter Delete device All content that deleted undo button toolbar Select New either magnification icon resize Zoom Size Fit Width change size prefer image Drag uploaded Assets tab Upload using Files navigation added folder if them directly it Scaling properties right panel Customize headers footers scrolling under Properties Children controls need phone tablet desktop icons preview format

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: Use the UI library controls in Editor to make prototypes interactive Drag and drop canvas apply properties actions customize their function
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Before you can add UI controls to a prototype be sure have an image on page in the Editor To your prototypes Open and one of pages Select control from Controls tab left Drag onto canvas place it For example select Button or Hotspot With still selected change Properties Actions displayed right how element looks properties meet requirements what does when user selects want interact Check out UI5 Developer Guide Reference for more information Preview button toolbar preview test interactions Previewing displays as users will see them buttons other they respond return Publish Prototype If publish share with team collaboration icon Then URL others Create Study create study get feedback Add name description Go Research See User Studies In project new research give You images then questions about those participants answer HTML tasks complete using generate link which send third parties by email details creating studies

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You can publish a prototype at any time and share it with others This creates snapshot of the design
searchTopics.bodySearchText: From the Prototype page Select Publish icon in toolbar A shareable link displays with a specific URL address Project Copy and share others via email

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: SAP Web IDE is a web based tool that enables you to create and extend end user applications for browser mobile devices
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Web IDE simplifies the end to application life cycle prototyping development packaging deployment and customer extensions for SAPUI5 applications Use collaborate with business experts designers fulfill user requirements expectations more effectively

searchTopics.titleSearchText: Extend Prototypes with SAP Web IDE
searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: SAP Web IDE is a web based tool that enables you to create and extend end user applications for browser mobile devices It simplifies the application life cycle prototyping development packaging deployment customer extensions SAPUI5
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Before working in Web IDE you must first Create a prototype the BUILD application Depending on what type of pages add to your see following sections for more information Add Blank Pages UI Editor start creating You can responsive various platforms blank freestyle or pre defined template create indicates an open canvas where whatever like Responsive build cross platform apps page layout use formats phone table and desktop automatically place controls according format tablet Smart Template provides smart templates that help design screens Publish See Prototype publish at any time share it with others This creates snapshot Import Excel file into Data find this here Github Set Run Configurations To prototypes set run configurations For using SAP HANA Cloud _self Open HCP link provided by Enable plugin Select Tools Preferences Under Plugins Optional select under Plugin Repository Then Save From Home File New menu Project from On Selection Build then Next Enter Name The project name letter underscore contain letters numbers periods underscores not end period System source available

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: To use Web IDE with BUILD prototypes you must first set run configurations in
searchTopics.bodySearchText: To set run configurations In Web IDE select Run Configurations and Select New Configuration create a type Application Uncheck the Open with Frame option Save You can now preview prototype applications after authentication through Cloud ID services because this launches application without test frame

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: BUILD provides smart templates that help you design screens for your prototype
searchTopics.bodySearchText: You need to have either created or imported a data model in order use Smart Templates create two types of pages when you The first page is called list report All subsequent are object Before get started using reports and take few minutes familiarize yourself with the BUILD Template interface templates contain following sections Control Palette displays controls that allowed by Outline structure can drag from control palette add content reorder delete items outline Property Pane properties selected then modify values these Preview read only preview template

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The List Report is the first page of a smart template prototype and used to filter few dedicated objects from large set contains bar above table
searchTopics.bodySearchText: The default list report contains a Filter bar with one filter Table These elements are contained in the Outline and displayed Preview pane Bar Controls You add filters to List Report by dragging control Add properties for each Properties sections template shown below Control palette BUILD lets you or more action buttons as well columns table them Action Button must be placed above As FilterBar controls button column your changes cannot make however can change order of following is an example completed It two five

searchTopics.titleSearchText: Control Properties in the List Report Template
searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: This table summarizes how properties are displayed in the property pane
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Control Property Name Description Filter Bar Allow Free Search Specifies if the Text box is displayed Not bindable Label of search for filter on object property to Bindable Table Title Object name in table header Action button action Displayed outline Column column Value Currency If this specified its value concatenated after and as a currency URL navigation another Page via proposing links from bound Additional A second be bold typeface above first Importance responsive behavior High always Medium appears when size decreases Low disappears Show sub totals Default No When set Yes content aggregated grouping fields properties The pane also displays an Event tab specify triggered selecting

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The Object Page displays all relevant information about an object template contains a header and collection of sections
searchTopics.bodySearchText: As with the list report template BUILD lets you add controls and sections by dragging them to Outline pane properties in Properties changes are displayed Preview You cannot make however of object page The Object Page contains following In header KPI Action button Simple Form Multi form Table a section Forms Element Groups Column outline Completed is an example completed

searchTopics.titleSearchText: Control Properties in the Object Page Template
searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: This table summarizes how properties are displayed in the property pane
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Location Property Name Description Header Bar Text The text display in the header bar at top of page Bindable Title object usually name ID current Can be bound to data model description Object Page Image Source URL pointing image that will displayed KPI title Displayed outline Value value on left Currency currency or unit for right Action Button Label action button Section section Form Group form group Element label element Mandatory Specifies if is mandatory If Yes an asterisk Column column Not bindable this property specified its concatenated after and as a Allow navigation another ObjectPage via proposing links from table Additional A second bold typeface above first Importance responsive behavior High always Medium appears when size decreases Low disappears Show sub totals Default No When set content aggregated grouping fields properties are pane you select Simple Multi Table node See Control Properties List Report

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: Every page whether it is a list report or an object has its main
searchTopics.bodySearchText: When you create a list report and object pages must select main In most cases the of first page should be same as bind or link your to that value for filter column in table it property which allows acquire all data For example add will linked This shows some concrete examples binding this was defined with three columns Values were selected each them Table set under Properties follows Column named ID is bound Product The Name Sections Object Pages You can have sections show relations between objects whose Expense Report an also second Destination BUILD navigate from one another by URL pane Data Model

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: Now that you are familiar with the interface ready to use BUILD Smart Templates create a list report and object pages
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Remember that you must have previously created a data model You need to upload BUILD before can add your list report and object pages

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: Once you have created your project can start using the smart templates Start by adding a list report and then upload data model
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Select your project then select Add on the List Report tile next screen Page 1 The UI Editor for Smart Templates opens is displayed in Outline pane with a filter bar and table objects Data tab left side of editor button This where you ll upload Excel file that will generate data model Objects From While BUILD allows to add manually or from business catalogs most models are generated files Browse locate want When uploaded generates Back return list report section under Properties pre populated properties object use as Main Object Each page has its main bind Once have selected ready configure

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: This section describes how to add and configure elements for the list report
searchTopics.bodySearchText: After you have selected the main object of your prototype can configure list report In Outline select Filter Under Properties type a description for filter example Name The will appear above box in on field from property which want to properties are those You must be pane able enter values Example Product bound Select Table Objects and title table For each column value or that would like Price Currency same If add columns action buttons under Controls control drag it Products At any time Preview button preview When ready populate then Go

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: After you configure your List Report are ready to one or more object pages
searchTopics.bodySearchText: From the Outline select New Page Object Smart Template The object page 2 opens By default contains following Header Form section Table Select then under Properties Main main is usually same as of list report In Under configure title and description bar text Title Description You can type a custom value or one from If you want to add KPI in for don t delete it Expand first outline group Group 1 form with its element labels have more than each label second Item that displayed rows table column values Preview button view your This elements Best Sellers Product name Midnight Fighter ID number P32191 One Information Reviews Two Number Notes A Individual Sales displays product part category continue adding editing data Editor As all forms there no need save work BUILD automatically saves preview at any time by selecting

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: Once you have configured the first level of object pages can continue to a lower data model
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Select New Page Object Smart Template Under Properties select the Main of your object page from list available objects When you main bind to As did in first configure header and section Depending on data model may not need table delete it Publish prototype Now can navigate second level pages

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: After create your list report and object page you can view prototype in a browser share it
searchTopics.bodySearchText: From one of the pages in your Smart Template prototype Select Publish icon button BUILD creates a link to Copy and paste it browser The opens You can test data using filter you navigate from page another by selecting rows also share with user

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The Edit mode lets you make changes in an object page without making the data model
searchTopics.bodySearchText: From the object page that you want to edit select Preview button Select Edit in header Make required changes then Save The modified data appears

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: In BUILD you can create and modify data models to organize elements in your projects
searchTopics.bodySearchText: The Data Editor displays objects graphically on the screen Drag and their relations directly in You can add one or several manually from a business catalog an Excel file

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: This topic describes how to access the Data Editor
searchTopics.bodySearchText: You need to create a project before accessing the Data Editor Do one of following If you are creating new select Page Map then Add on Blank tile already have go directly first page your In next screen The in application displays three tabs Select tab Under

searchTopics.titleSearchText: Add Objects to a Data Model Manually
searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: This section describes how to add objects a data model manually
searchTopics.bodySearchText: You are in the Data Editor Select Add Objects icon then select Manually from menu Type name of new object All changes to your data model saved automatically can drag objects various locations page After you add must properties and create relations between

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You create relations from a selected object to target
searchTopics.bodySearchText: For a given object relation is defined with Name Target Cardinality A foreign key added to the in BUILD model materialize links between data of part can be specified as Read only or write unidirectional but you specify two relations opposite directions objects You create 1 n from an target B multiple same that self pointing In ways By manually drawing line linking using Add New Relation button under Relations tab side pane Default values are DefaultName Current Object The default modified name must obey following rules maximum length 40 characters first character letter underscore Subsequent alphanumeric No spaces allowed may not another

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: After you add objects to the data model must create relations between
searchTopics.bodySearchText: In the Data Editor select object that you want to create a relation from right side panel Relations then New Relation Type name for Select target dropdown list and cardinality 1 or n The appears in data model like this You can also blue circle on corner of drag arrow another between objects

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You can edit a relation from the Relations tab in right side panel of Data Editor
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Under the Relations tab select relation that you want to edit In Info dialog box make required changes You can following Name Target object Cardinality Read write status also view name of foreign key used in model manage relationships between instances two objects

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You need to observe several rules when naming objects
searchTopics.bodySearchText: The maximum length 40 characters first character must be an alphabetical or underscore Subsequent underscores No spaces are allowed object name may not the same as another in data model Some names such C R which Excel reserved

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You can add objects from business catalogs by using the Search feature
searchTopics.bodySearchText: From the data model select search link or Add Search from list In for Data Objects screen type name of object catalog that you are searching Select one objects found in business next what want to add You can just and its relations If import children

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You can add objects or an entire data model from Excel spreadsheet
searchTopics.bodySearchText: In the Data Editor Select Add From Excel from menu Browse to locate and select file you want import The objects their properties are displayed in You can then add delete or edit as well more manually search BUILD provides sample files help create data models

searchTopics.titleSearchText: Rules for Adding Objects or Importing from a Spreadsheet
searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: When adding objects or importing via Excel you need to respect these following rules
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Foreign Keys and Mapping Table Rule Error Message An object must have one property column named ID Object name You need There can be only The first of the A file cannot contain both foreign keys mapping tables relation either 1 N or Invalid cardinality for content unique may not null empty shall t IDs referenced in exist model Excel table value entity doesn Only required syntax is from Relation to key Please check two objects existing example target imported Key does current that contains depending on a type n identified as this an Whatever its source From To columns In sheet format all cells apart data area itself x rows no random text around No allowed modify your Rules Adding Objects order names properties relations valid you respect following rules maximum length 40 characters Names more than character letter underscore alphabetic Subsequent letters numbers case spaces before after last white are removed during import process toto becomes next alphanumeric same between duplicated use duplicate Property already exists added Data Model Import Samples Every sample available X When importing structure exactly with well if any Properties Relations identical those

searchTopics.titleSearchText: Use Sample Files to Create a Data Model
searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: BUILD provides you with sample Excel files to help create data models from a spreadsheet
searchTopics.bodySearchText: You can access the sample data at following URL https github com SAP BUILD User Assistance tree master Sample 20Data 20Model 20XL 20files The files are in branch Before logging on you may need to create a GitHub http www account Formats use one of three formats model from an Excel Table using mapping table recommended foreign keys sheet alternative useful when exporting transactional system such as ERP CRM and so Reference Data Model 4 Objects their Relations provides samples each supported format for this reference SampleModel 4Objects Tables MappingTables xlsx ForeignKeys Sheets with 2 Unique Relation example file preferred 2Objects Only but single 2Objects2Relations About Cardinality supports relations cardinality 1 n that is In deduced will be if some elements source Object mapped multiple target all element key column stores If Source Target

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: Add properties to an object from the right side panel in Data Editor
searchTopics.bodySearchText: In the Data Editor select Properties in right side panel Select New Property then type name of property field Make sure that you follow naming rules The maximum length is 40 characters first character must be a letter or an underscore Subsequent alphanumeric No spaces are allowed different from names other properties object list standard values String default value Numeric Date To display more advanced types Show

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: BUILD allows you to specify a formula for property This is calculated
searchTopics.bodySearchText: In the Data Editor select Properties in right side panel Select New Property DefaultName field type a property name Then from dropdown list The of new cannot contain spaces Formula tab Create drag formula elements Value Operator and if needed Condition to area below values for each element an object model one its properties Enter value this operator Arithmetic operators Comparison Logical And Or IS NULL conditions syntax Three sections IF THEN ELSE are automatically added canvas You can specify nested If is valid displayed it not error message appears

searchTopics.titleSearchText: Editing Data Under the Samples Tab
searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: BUILD allows you to modify data by editing it directly in the application or importing exporting files and from an Excel spreadsheet These actions are performed under Samples tab
You can edit data in the Data Editor using Samples tab
searchTopics.bodySearchText: From the Data Editor select object you want to edit then Open Make changes in table cells or header If necessary plus sign upper left of add new rows When are finished with OK

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: BUILD allows you to import data for existing objects and export models a spreadsheet from the Samples tab
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Importing When importing you can either drag a file from your local drive or browse to choose You import one of three formats Data sheet with foreign keys Table mapping table The structure the that must correspond exactly data model in BUILD is objects their properties and relations Exporting exporting Excel takes name project always tables export selected object entire also select Relations Tables which means are identified by If do not

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The following are example workflows
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Example Manually Adding an Object to a Data Model You have generated data model from Excel file and now you want add object manually Properties In this example properties the that just created can in your Exporting Modified previous workflows modified workflow export

searchTopics.titleSearchText: Example Manually Adding an Object to a Data Model
searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You have generated a data model from an Excel file and now you want to add object manually
searchTopics.bodySearchText: This is your canvas before you add the object In data model select plus icon and Manually from list The new appears on with a default name Object1 Type for in this example Supplier Drag to right side of Data Editor align that want create relation Place cursor blue circle at corner Product drag line which creates connection You have type 1 so need change cardinality Select then Relations tab n next SupplierSet Under Info set

searchTopics.titleSearchText: Example Adding Properties to an Object
searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: In this example you add properties to the object that have just created
searchTopics.bodySearchText: We ll add two properties SupplierName and EmailAddress to the Supplier object of data model Select that you want a property in this case Product then select Properties tab New Property below list Type name for type String Add another leave as The new appear your

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You can add data to an object in your model manually
searchTopics.bodySearchText: In this example you add data to the Supplier object that created in previous workflow Select then Samples tab Open Editor editor name of is at top page plus sign below This adds a line table Notice properties appear column headers ID SupplierName and EmailAddress Type information S1 for One Bob com OK You have added your are ready export it

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: In the previous example workflows you have modified data in an object this workflow export model to Excel
searchTopics.bodySearchText: With your modified model open select Samples Export Select Data Model to export the entire Leave default value Relations with Tables selected in order keep structure of data its mapping tables The is downloaded location on computer When you spreadsheet can see object that added Supplier properties and ID SupplierName EmailAddress

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The BUILD user research module lets you to quickly create and share studies gather detailed feedback from colleagues or end users about images project pages interactive HTML prototype applications
searchTopics.bodySearchText: To start you create a new study give it name and then add images or HTML prototypes to You enter questions be answered about each image tasks for participants complete on Then publish the generate link which can send third parties by email When click opens in their browser If they don t have BUILD account Sign Up page is displayed Once option keep responses anonymous As project team members view Research almost immediately rect 239 27 421 112 Create Projects use are always working multiple projects In unique prototype application invite other colleagues become contributing user research studies specific 449 210 649 293 User Studies those answer using 451 404 626 488 Invite People Participate Publishing generates URL that people such as end users them participate your 266 610 452 699 particpate must receive creator member of The open respond attempt task opted out receiving notifications from tile I section select 71 407 246 494 74 211 252 295 View Analyze Responses soon A active Project was created within Therefore before For more information see Log Open Email

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: In a project you create new research study and give it name You add images to the then questions about those for participants answer can HTML prototypes tasks complete using Then publish generate link which send third parties by email
searchTopics.bodySearchText: You must have created a project or be member of an existing in order create user research study On the Home page select tile The Project is displayed In Study Activity section NEW STUDY Name and Description dialog Tip Alternatively you can Research button on left panel Feeback which diplayed Enter name description for For more information see Guidelines Names Descriptions your to participants when they open link their browser should help understand what about why are being asked participate Select Save To add content engage with questions tasks Create task ask question drag image thumbnails re them Preview icon preview Previewing displays new tab exactly as will it answer images but answers not saved publish Publish A unique URL invite third parties by emailing this

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: To add a task to study you upload an interactive prototype select Start and Target pages enter some guidance for users follow Study participants will interact with the based on user I HAVE FINISHED THIS TASK button when they have displayed page
searchTopics.bodySearchText: To add a task to BUILD user research study you must have compressed ZIP HTML prototype application available base the on On Study page select Create tile The Select Prototype dialog is displayed Upload file containing your link browse for and Open If previously uploaded want use as basic radio button be used basis Next Enter name in Name Task text box any pages that do not include are deselected included thumbnail Define Roll over begin with Start assigned make target Target no it will possible participants fail In User guidance enter clear description of what required complete For example may describe which display or specific completed if Save Close created representing You can drag re order images tasks PUBLISH publish Alternatively another by selecting New question Question

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You can add images to BUILD user research studies and ask questions about the
searchTopics.bodySearchText: To add images and questions to a BUILD user research study you must first create the enter name description for For more information see Create User Research Studies In project new give it You then about those participants answer can HTML prototypes tasks complete using Then publish generate link which send third parties by email Select Ask question tile on Study page The Images dialog is displayed upload select Upload button browse want include in your are upoaded A thumbnail of each image Questions right hand panel Question text box specify how respond selecting one following options Answer through annotation only specifies that drop Annotation icons onto optionally comment with icon limit number annotations particpant Limit check entering maximum free an Participants also voluntarily comments multiple choice choose their responses from choices minimum two boxes additional Add Enable answers particpants than reponse if ask another this move next Next After have added at least quesiton Done created drag thumbnails re order Alternatively New or task Task

searchTopics.titleSearchText: Guidelines for Study Names and Descriptions
searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The name and description of your user research study is displayed to participants when they open the link in their browser should help understand what about why are being asked participate
searchTopics.bodySearchText: When you select Create A Study on the Research and Feedback page Name Description dialog is displayed The name to study participants so they can get an initial idea of what about You use up 40 characters for In user research studies design application could as general try avoid using abbreviations may cause confusion Sample Good Manage Payment Bad Blocks SFIN GLAP should write this description engage interest that are motivated complete all maximum number in a 300 Here sample adapt according your needs asked view images answer one or more questions each Based responses we will be able identify how improve our designs

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You publish a study to geneate unique link URL that you can send participants
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Publish a study when you have added at least one image and question To publish the select PUBLISH A unique link URL is generated

searchTopics.titleSearchText: Invite People to Participate In User Research Studies
searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: Publishing a research study generates unique URL that you email to people such as colleagues or end users invite them participate in your
searchTopics.bodySearchText: When you have finished creating your study select the Publish button The is published and a unique link URL displayed On same page can invite users to participate in by entering an email address selecting ADD for each user You additional participants at any time on Participant Invitation To view this tile Research tab retrieve research For more information see Retrieve Study Links active after created

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You can retrieve the study link for an active user research at any time after you have created a
searchTopics.bodySearchText: To retieve a study link for user research do one of the following After you publish copy from Link to your text box on page displayed On Project select Get icon tile in Study Activity section Select Active tab Research and Feedback

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: To particpate in a BUILD user research study participants must receive by email unique link URL the creator or team member of project The open their browser respond to questions about each image and attempt complete task If you have opted out receiving notifications from tile for is displayed Studies I Participate In section on your Projects page select participate
searchTopics.bodySearchText: You can participate in BUILD user research studies using Google Chrome on Windows and Mac OS To open the study email inviation copy unique link URL it your browser If you have opted out of eceiving notifications from click tile Studies I Participate In section Projects page The home for is displayed including name description displays do not select want to be kept anonymous check box associated with responses start responding Start Study first image or task question Answer questions as follows For that require answer through annotation only respond by selecting drop Annotation icons optionally enter a comment each icon move previous dropped edit comments text an provided also add additional multiple choice one more answers It may possible than reponse Display next Next when entered item Task dialog guidance about how complete tasks must interact prototype attempt User Guidance right hand penel Abandon button panel at any time quit provide feedback anytime Leave View Feedback dropping leave When finished providing Done completed HAVE FINISHED THIS TASK result side responded all Participants are now available creator other members project Active tab Research Project which was created

searchTopics.titleSearchText: View and Analyze Responses to User Research Studies
searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You can view participants responses to your research studies almost as soon they enter them A tile for each user study is displayed on the Research page active Project of project in which was created
searchTopics.bodySearchText: This diagram shows how responses from research study participants and statistics about their are provided rect 34 162 145 271 Overview of Responses to User Research Studies The tab on the Results page active or archived user studies provides a summary high level quantiative 195 156 308 273 You can view your almost as soon they enter them A tile for each is displayed Project project in which was created 363 20 473 100 365 117 474 196 Tasks Questions task question detailed by selecting thumbnail images 210 475 294 Participants Page 310 390 Settings owner pause archive restart paused at anytime 535 22 643 102 High Level Statistics tasks result 122 198 questions with text answer multiple choice answers annotations comments 533 212 645 293 536 306 393 701 16 811 48 Task On you display 704 56 88 Prototype 700 97 813 134 143 812 176 Detailed image default select 233 810 702 333 815 368

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: On the Research page you can display tiles for all Active Draft or Archived user research studies in project by selecting relevant tab
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Active tab statistics about user research studies and responses to them are available if the study is active From this it possible for participants respond Draft draft that have been created but not yet published They can still be modified before publication won t contain any participant Archived viewed once archived It no longer archive unless restarted You view displayed on or select tile a analyze Then you also display following of Overview Tasks Questions Participants Participant Invitation Settings

searchTopics.titleSearchText: Overview of Responses to User Research Studies
searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The Overview tab on the Results page of active or archived user research studies provides a summary high level quantiative statistics about responses to study
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Fig 5 4 2 The Overview tab Icons on the Icon Description Statistics about Total Number of Responses 100 Completed Studies participants in study Average time spent positive sentiments neutral negative annotations dropped comments entered studies completed Most a Least

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The Tasks and Questions tab on the Results page of active or archived studies provides high level statistics about participants responses to each task question in study You can view detailed by selecting thumbnail images
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Fig 4 3 1 Tasks and Questions tab

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: High level statistics about tasks in a study are displayed on the Tasks and Questions tab result page of active or archived
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Fig 5 4 3 1 Tasks and Questions tab Icons for High Level Statistics about Description Number of participants who attempted the task Average time spent on number pages which made selections completed correctly particpants incorrectly abandoned before it was complete

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: High level statistics about questions with a text answer multiple choice answers and in annotations comments study are displayed on the Tasks Questions tab
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Fig 5 4 3 2 1 Tasks and Questions tab Icons for High level Statistics about in Studies Icon Description Free text Form Question Multiple Choce with Annotation Commnets Number of participants who attempted the task annotations dropped on image comments entered Thumbnail You can select thumbnail to view responses question each multiple choice options selected The percentage which option was positive sentiments neutral negative

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: On the Results page of your study you can display participants responses to a task in by selecting thumbnail on Tasks and Questions tab
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Fig 5 4 3 1 Detailed Statistics about tasks The following tabs can be displayed for a task Task Overview tab of the participants responses to displays statistics and detailed Prototype fully interactive prototype upon which was based each page overall information who attempted complete You export question data by selecting Export Question Data link on this

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The Task Overview tab of the participants responses to a task displays statistics about and detailed
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Fig 5 4 3 1 Detailed Statistics about Tasks Task Overview Icon Description of participants who completed the task correctly particpants incorrectly abandoned before it was complete Thumbnail page A thumbnail is displayed to represent each prototype in Select a display at that For more information see Prototype The tab displays fully interactive upon which based and responses overall Number visited this Average amount time annotation icons dropped on lower position identified as correct final for comments entered sentiments were positive neutral negative

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The Prototype tab displays the fully interactive prototype upon which task was based and participants responses to each page of overall
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Fig 5 4 3 1 Prototype The tab displays the fully interactive prototype upon which task was based and participants responses to each page of overall You can do following on Select Show Annotations button View all annotations icons dropped fades significantly so that you view annotation more easily comments entered about this in COMMENTS right hand panel In addition filter by sentiment Heatmap show a heatmap represents frequency location user selection currently displayed Interact with navigating through using prototypes itself or selecting PREVIOUS NEXT side

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The Statistics tab displays overall statistics about a task and information participants who attempted to complete the You can export question data by selecting Export Question Data link on this page
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Fig 5 4 3 1 The Statistics tab Icons for Overall About a Task Icon Description Number of participants who attempted the task Average amount time displayed each page number pages made selections on least taken by participant to complete most completed correctly particpants incorrectly abandoned before it was in lower position no identified this as correct final annotation icons dropped comments entered about sentiments that were positive neutral negative Breakdown Participants Attempts Complete Column Participant Displays name Result whether or not Pages Visited visited Total Duration spent Annotation Comments

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The Page Flow page shows the order in which each study participant displayed pages prototype while attempting to complete task
searchTopics.bodySearchText: The relative thickness of the lines that link pages indicates proportion participants who moved between those For example in image more checkout html and payment than submit order

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You can view the responses to and statistics about questions in studies by selecting thumbnail image for on Tasks Questions tab The Page Overview is displayed default select Statistics display question
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Fig 5 4 3 1 Overview of Responses to Individual Multiple Choice Questions 2 Free Text Form Annotation Based Page Tab Question Type tab The Results in the right hand side panel displays percentages responses participants selected for each choice Comments comments entered about this question If you select a comment line is displayed connecting icon which it was On can filter by sentiment particiapants Statistics 6 Icons About Icon Description Number who answered Average amount time annotation icons dropped on page sentiments that were positive neutral negative Participant Breakdown s interaction with Colum PARTICIPANT Specifies participant name if has not I want be kept anonymous check box study TIME ON PAGE Specifes paticipant spent ANNOTATIONS number annotations

Icons for Statistics About Individual Questions Icon Description Number of participants who participated in the study Average amount time spent taking Total number annotation icons dropped on images and prototype pages by all comments entered questions attemped tasks attempted Participant Breakdown about each s interaction with this page Column PARTICIPANT Specifies participant name if did not selected I want to be kept anonymous check box TIME ON PAGE Specifes paticipants TASK COMPLETED total completed QUESTION answere ANNOTATIONS annotations that COMMENTS

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: You can invite additional participants at any time from the Participant Invitation page To view this select study tile on Research and Inviation tab
The project owner can pause or archive research studies restart paused archived at anytime
searchTopics.bodySearchText: When a study is created it automatically active Active studies are displayed on the Research page and Project Pausing Studies Once you have paused Archive Restart buttons become available in research Settings tab It not possible to retrieve link for from participants can t enter responses Paused Archiving archived cannot Archived Feedback Restarting restarted retrive

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: Project owners can pause a study at anytime
searchTopics.bodySearchText: On the Home page select project tile that contains user research study Select Research button on navigation bar Active tab Settings I want to pause this check box and Selecting Pause results of The is paused Archive Restart buttons become available from It not possible retrieve link for studies participants can t respond Paused are displayed

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: Project owners can archive paused studies at anytime
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Select the project tile that contains user research study on Home page Settings Research I want to archive this ARCHIVE The is archived Archived studies are displayed from Archive tab

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: Project owners can restart paused or archived studies at anytime
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Select the project tile that contains user research study on Home page Research navigation bar Settings I want to archive this RESTART The is now active again Active studies are displayed from tab

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: As a BUILD Administrator you need to follow these initial steps before users can use the system You will receive Welcome email from SAP team with instructions on how get started as
searchTopics.bodySearchText: To enable users to use the BUILD system Open Welcome email and select Activate Me create your Cloud Identity In also Set things up in Admin console After you log with page opens left sidebar Access toolbar on Verify that domain access is listed configured level for automatically Do not add domains such as gmail com or yahoo because this would allow all Gmail Yahoo Your need Full instead of Guest With Study Project Invitation Change levels new needed Select Users then user name make sure are set a Standard User if Send URL their they standard No additional admin changes necessary The allows manage view audit logs For more information about see Console Administrator

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: The BUILD Admin console allows the Administrator to manage users domains and view audit logs
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Administrators can Manage Users BUILD use the Admin Console to view and delete users assign roles View Audit Log Admins download user audit log files Set Domain Access add domains permissions each domain from these then be assigned access Before anyone system need complete a few initial setup steps For more information see Get Started with As Administrator you follow before You will receive Welcome email SAP team instructions on how get started as

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: BUILD Admins can use the Admin Console to view and download user audit log files
searchTopics.bodySearchText: To view and download audit log files On the left sidebar select Audit From calendar a date range Last 24 Hours 48 10 Days or Custom Select Download A file is generated in csv comma separated value Save it to your computer for details on user access permissions more

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: BUILD Administrators can use the Admin Console to view and delete users assign roles
searchTopics.bodySearchText: Users and Roles To view users On the left sidebar select BUILD are displayed Change user using icons on top right side Select to summaries details search for a specific enter name or email address in box at their role Check appropriate OK Standard can create manage projects Guest only participate studies If you Administrator want access need assign yourself When change s from OR delete system automatically deletes all project teams owns study feedback associated with deleted Delete icon next summary detail Confirm this related then

searchTopics.shortdescSearchText: BUILD Administrators can add domains and assign roles permissions to each domain Users from these then be assigned access
searchTopics.bodySearchText: To add a new domain On the left sidebar select Access The List is displayed first access to Admin Console default level set No Select New Domain BUILD and assign permissions Before you can domains for users must your own give it Full Then more Enter name in format domainname com example sap From dropdown You choose from following levels Level Permissions Users cannot at all Study Invitation Only study by invitation only as Guest user or Project project When usesr are invited they become Standard so collaborate on With sign URL also studies invitations sent them other have full features Repeat these steps want
